content.raw: This targets merging with drcsim_4.2, while the simple shape fixes (#533) have been merged with default. We would prefer a model that has both the simple shape improvements plus a correct head, so I'd recommend to decide on a single branch for merging all model improvements.
content.html: This targets merging with drcsim_4.2, while the simple shape fixes (#533) have been merged with default. We would prefer a model that has both the simple shape improvements plus a correct head, so I'd recommend to decide on a single branch for merging all model improvements.
